ModMetaData.name: Fix Mech Threat Delay
ModMetaData.author: kathanon
ModMetaData.description:
When calling in a mech treat after being bestowed with a royal title, there will always be a delay of 1-3 days before the threat arrives. This is a bug, the delay should only occur when there are friendly visitors present on the map (trade caravan, bestower or visiting pawns).
This mod fixes the bug. Also works when applied to a game in progress.
